languages.text: "Утверждение... честно. Коллектив Амарнат был ошибкой. Моей ошибкой. Я исправил ее, похоронив пять шестых себя во тьме небытия. Хвала Омниссии".
"This statement is... honest. The Amarnat Collective was a mistake. A mistake I made. I corrected it as I buried five-sixths of myself in the dark nothingness. Praise the Omnissiah."
languages.original_text: "Утверждение... честно. Коллектив Амарнат был ошибкой. Моей ошибкой. Я исправил ее, похоронив пять шестых себя во тьме небытия. Хвала Омниссии".

traits.locale_text: "The statement is... honest. The Amarnat Collective was a mistake. A mistake I had made. I corrected it as I buried five sixths of myself in the dark nothingness. Praise the Omnissiah."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这种说法是……诚实的。阿玛纳特聚合意识是个错误，是我犯下的错误。我把我六分之五的存在埋葬在了黑暗的虚无之中，纠正了这个错误。赞美欧姆尼塞亚。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is... honest. The Amarnat Collective was a mistake. A mistake I made. I corrected it as I buried five-sixths of myself in the dark nothingness. Praise the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是……诚实的。阿玛纳特聚合意识是个错误，是我犯下的错误。我把我六分之五的存在埋葬在了黑暗的虚无之中，纠正了这个错误。赞美欧姆尼塞亚。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «La declaración es... sincera. El Colectivo Amarnat fue un error. Un error que cometí. Lo corregí al enterrar cinco sectas partes de mi ser en la oscuridad de la nada. Alabado sea el Omnissiah».
languages.original_text: "This statement is... honest. The Amarnat Collective was a mistake. A mistake I made. I corrected it as I buried five-sixths of myself in the dark nothingness. Praise the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: «La declaración es... sincera. El Colectivo Amarnat fue un error. Un error que cometí. Lo corregí al enterrar cinco sectas partes de mi ser en la oscuridad de la nada. Alabado sea el Omnissiah».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「この言葉は…誠実なものだ。アマルナト集合体は間違いだった。私が犯した過ちだ。私は己の6分の5を暗い無の渦中へと埋め込み、それを正したのだ。万機神を讃えよ」
languages.original_text: "This statement is... honest. The Amarnat Collective was a mistake. A mistake I made. I corrected it as I buried five-sixths of myself in the dark nothingness. Praise the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: 「この言葉は…誠実なものだ。アマルナト集合体は間違いだった。私が犯した過ちだ。私は己の6分の5を暗い無の渦中へと埋め込み、それを正したのだ。万機神を讃えよ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist ... ehrlich. Das Amarnat-Kollektiv war ein Fehler. Ein Fehler, den ich begangen habe. Ich habe ihn korrigiert, als ich fünf Sechstel meiner Selbst im dunklen Nichts begraben habe. Gepriesen sei der Omnissiah."
languages.original_text: "This statement is... honest. The Amarnat Collective was a mistake. A mistake I made. I corrected it as I buried five-sixths of myself in the dark nothingness. Praise the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist ... ehrlich. Das Amarnat-Kollektiv war ein Fehler. Ein Fehler, den ich begangen habe. Ich habe ihn korrigiert, als ich fünf Sechstel meiner Selbst im dunklen Nichts begraben habe. Gepriesen sei der Omnissiah."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cette déclaration est... juste. Le collectif Amarnat était une erreur. Une erreur que j'ai commise. Je l'ai corrigée en enfouissant cinq sixièmes de ma personne dans les ténèbres du néant. Loué soit l'Omnimessie. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is... honest. The Amarnat Collective was a mistake. A mistake I made. I corrected it as I buried five-sixths of myself in the dark nothingness. Praise the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: « Cette déclaration est... juste. Le collectif Amarnat était une erreur. Une erreur que j'ai commise. Je l'ai corrigée en enfouissant cinq sixièmes de ma personne dans les ténèbres du néant. Loué soit l'Omnimessie. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "This statement is... honest. The Amarnat Collective was a mistake. A mistake I made. I corrected it as I buried five-sixths of myself in the dark nothingness. Praise the Omnissiah."

languages.text: "Bu önerme... Dürüst. Amarnat Bütünlüğü bir hataydı. Benim yaptığım bir hata. Altıda beşimi karanlık hiçliğe gömerek bu hatayı düzelttim. Hermesih'e şükürler olsun."
languages.original_text: "This statement is... honest. The Amarnat Collective was a mistake. A mistake I made. I corrected it as I buried five-sixths of myself in the dark nothingness. Praise the Omnissiah."
